import { useState } from 'react'; import * as S from '../styles/personalstyles' import HomeHeader from '../components/header'; import Hours from '../components/hours'; import Level from '../components/level'; import css from '../img/css.png'; import html from '../img/html.png'; import js from '../img/js.png'; import react from '../img/react.png' import node from '../img/node.png' const Home = ()=>{ const [menuClick,setMenuClick] = useState(false); const HandleMenuClick = ()=>{ (!menuClick? setMenuClick(true) : setMenuClick(false)) } const handleAbout = ()=>{ window.scrollTo({top:280}) } const handlePort = ()=>{ window.scrollTo({top:500}) } const handleSkills = ()=>{ window.scrollTo({top:1000}) } const handleContact = ()=>{ } return( <> {!!menuClick?
